To display a list of icons, use the extended sections Text and Image formatter. Then set the following element settings:

  • Layout: Image left, Heading and Text right (in separate column) 
  • Type of series: As unorderd list ( ul ) - formatted like a description list
  • Link display: Link the headline
  • Image size (desktop): About 8% (1/12) of the available width
  • Show image zoom: No (uncheck)
  • Link image: Yes (check)
